content: fugly monster version 9 - axel shredmane axel shredmane is a nod to the heyday of 80 s hairmetal 5mm hook worsted weight yarn in eight colors skin shirt pants boots inner mouth hair & guitar body/neck dk or thinner in white for teeth fabric for headband - strip of bandana etc or crochet one long enough optional - earrings necklace belt w/button buckle worked in the round - top down unless otherwise noted this pattern has not been tested aside from myself i have double checked the pattern but feel free to message me with any questions
